name: Eataround
tagline: Android application that uses AR and the Yelp API to display nearby restaurants dependent on device rotation relative to restaurant location.
body:
### EatAround
EatAround Is an android application that detects nearby restaurants based on device accelerometer and gyroscope motion. It displays restaurants as color-coded dots on-screen respective of it's true physical location once again factoring in the position and state of the device.

### Updates
EatAround is still in development.

### Authors and Contributors
@alec-hewitt is the main contributor to this project.
Visit my website! www.ahewdev.com
